ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I learned about the history of women film from the early 1900s to the present day spanning different cultures and formal techniques.

Before this class I didn't really know what directors did and when talking about movies I really only considered the characters, the plot, and the script. This class taught me to actually dissect movies and consider things like color choice, framing, editing, and pacing. I found I could actually articulate what made me love a movie or hate it as I had more words in my film vocabulary.
I learned about female filmmakers and their films.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: I loved the filmmaker presentations because I learned about other artists outside of the syllabus. I also liked that Oksana encouraged us to take notes while watching films. I do think discussion could've been facilitated better though.

This class is really fantastic. I looked forward to it every week. I would have never seen the majority of the films shown just because I didn't know they existed but I'm so glad I was exposed to them. I think the readings enhanced the movies and allowed me to have a more informed conversation in class. I also appreciate that the class worked for those of us who had never taken a film class before. Oksana introduced concepts gradually so I was able to build up my knowledge of film over the course of the class and I never felt that I was significantly behind my classmates even though many of them had more experience in film classes than me.
I enjoyed the movies we watched.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: I would recommend this course if you're interested in learning about the different types of film and filmmakers that are out there.

I would! It's just a really fun course, you'll learn a lot, and you'll watch some amazing films. You'll definitely end the class as a more informed, more interested, and more engaged consumer of media.
